name: Online Appointment Booking System ulocateus.php文件SQL注入漏洞
product: ["Online Appointment Booking System Online Appointment Booking System 1.0"]
description: Online Appointment Booking System是一个网上预约系统。Online Appointment Booking System存在SQL注入漏洞，该漏洞源于文件/ulocateus.php中参数doctorname的错误缺少对外部输入SQL语句的验证。攻击者可利用该漏洞执行非法SQL命令窃取数据库敏感数据。
solution:
目前厂商尚未发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://code-projects.org/
